title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. And then the user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled "Error".
OB: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message appears indicating that the changes need to be saved. The error message displayed is "Source page is dirty.".
EB: A better and more typical approach would be to provide clearer and more informative messaging. The dialog should not be titled "Error" with quotes, and instead it should indicate that the XML Report Design has been changed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the XML Report Designer.
2. Edit the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor.
3. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view.
4. Note the error message indicating that the changes need to be saved.
